name: @coon-js/extjs-lib-comp

sencha.name: extjs-lib-comp
sencha.creator: coon.js
sencha.summary: NPM package providing Livegrid-plugin and a collection of enhanced views and related functionality for Sencha ExtJS applications.
sencha.detailedDescription: This package contains extended and advanced implementations for ExtJS projects which are related to view components. Requires @coon-js/extjs-lib-core. Also home of the Livegrid-plugin.

description: NPM package providing component library for ExtJS projects

scripts.build:test: npm i --save-dev && npx extjs-link && npx siesta-lib-helper
scripts.release:patch: npm run preversion && standard-version --release-as patch && npm run postversion
scripts.release:minor: npm run preversion && standard-version --release-as minor && npm run postversion
scripts.release:major: npm run preversion && standard-version --release-as major && npm run postversion

author: Thorsten Suckow-Homberg <thorsten@suckow-homberg.de>
